org.vertx.groovy.platform
[Groovy] Class Verticle

java.lang.Object
  org.vertx.groovy.platform.Verticle

@groovy.transform.CompileStatic
abstract class Verticle

Represents a Verticle that runs in the container.

If you are creating a Groovy compiled Verticle you should extend this class to create your verticle.

Authors:
swilliams

Container container

The Container instance
Vertx vertx

The Vertx instance
 
Method Summary
java.lang.Object start()

Override this to implement a synchronous start
java.lang.Object start(Future startedResult)

Override this to implement an asynchronous start, and use the startedResult to signal when startup is complete
java.lang.Object stop()

This will be called when the verticle is stopped
